trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of floating-point x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una coppia ordinata di coordinate x e y a virgola mobile, che definisce un punto in un piano bidimensionale.

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Per convertire un <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> per un <xref:System.Drawing.Point>, utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Round%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Truncate%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: Posizione orizzontale del punto.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: Posizione verticale del punto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> con le coordinate specificate.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified size.
trans-unit.target: Converte un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> dato in base alle dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che specifica i numeri da aggiungere alle coordinate di <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> dato in base all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> convertito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> della dimensione specificata per la coordinata x del <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> per la coordinata y del <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> che specifica i numeri da aggiungere alle coordinate di <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> dato in base a un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> convertito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> metodo aggiunge il <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> della dimensione specificata per la coordinata x del <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> e <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> per la coordinata y del <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call `AddExample`, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Gestire il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate `AddExample`, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> class with member data left uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> con i dati dei membri non inizializzati.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> contains the same coordinates as the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> contiene le stesse coordinate dell'elemento <see cref="T:System.Object" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method returns <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> and has the same coordinates as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo restituisce <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> è un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> e ha le stesse coordinate di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Valore intero che specifica un valore hash per questa struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questa matrice <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> è vuota.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> are 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il valore di entrambe le proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> è 0; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates the given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a specified size.
trans-unit.target: Converte l' elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> dato in base alle dimensioni specificate.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che specifica la coppia di numeri da aggiungere alle coordinate di <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> in base a un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> convertito.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente aggiunge un'ombreggiatura a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> utilizzando il <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operatore.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare questo codice in un form e chiamare il `AddShadow` metodo quando si gestisce il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Make sure the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Verificare che il form contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> denominato `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> that specifies the numbers to add to the x- and y-coordinates of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> che specifica i numeri da aggiungere alle coordinate x e y dell'elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operator adds the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size to the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> to the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A> operatore aggiunge il <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> della dimensione specificata per la coordinata x del <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> e <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> per la coordinata y del <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: Il metodo equivalente per l'operatore è <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.Add%28System.Drawing.PointF%2CSystem.Drawing.SizeF%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.target: Gestire il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate `opAdditionExample`, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> strutture.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato specifica se i valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> delle due strutture <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of the left and right <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structures are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se i valori <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> delle strutture <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> di destra e di sinistra sono uguali. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the coordinates of the specified points are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se le coordinate dei punti specificati non sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> values of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> per indicare che i valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.PointF.Y" /> di <paramref name="left" /> e <paramref name="right" /> non sono uguali. In caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Subtraction%2A> operator subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Width%2A> of the specified size from the x-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> and the <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.Height%2A> from the y-coordinate of the <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>.
